Program_Policies: A minimum of 6 credits at the 400 level; maximum of 6 credits may be double-counted.; A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).
